column7: passed away peacefully with her family at her side
column12: oklahoma to bennett and della neely. she was a homemaker and a member of lake arlington baptist church. mary loved flowers
column14: cooking and working cross word puzzles. survivors: husband of 69 years

column22: virginia woolsey and nelda paschel; and many loving nieces and nephews.
